description: This file contains the implementation of the Bootstrap affix plugin (version 3.2.0), which manages element positioning based on scroll position, including class toggling and event handling.

classes.name: Affix
classes.description: Class managing the affix behavior, including position checks, class toggling, and event triggering.

methods.name: getPinnedOffset
methods.description: Calculates and caches the pinned offset for the element.

methods.name: checkPositionWithEventLoop
methods.description: Schedules a position check after a short delay.

methods.name: checkPosition
methods.description: Determines the affix state based on scroll position and updates classes and styles accordingly.
